inscription.text: New Darrocq Cars for hire in Calcutta During the royal visit
For hire by the day, week or month
An experienced Chauffeur in uniform sent out with every car.

Special 15-9 H.P. Four-Cylinder, Five-seated Darracq "Coronation" Model For terms apply early to: The Commercial East India Agency Co., Ltd., Manufacturers' Agents, Contractors of the Government of India, Sole Agents in India for Darracq Cars 83, Old China Bazaar Street, Calcutta; Lahore; and at Central Motor Garage, Coronation Durbar

On this advertisement for Darracq cars, an old car from the beginning of the 20th century can be seen. Contact details of the company advertising as well as some basic information about the car are depicted as well. (gs)

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.
